Author: HannahAching
Text: They could have worded it neutral. Like, a rounder face shape. They chose to say fat.  :(  To be fair, to someone wothout an ED, the word fat probably doesn't hurt as much. Damnit, I don't even remember how normal people feel about words.

Author: coffeeandnarcissism
Text: Why the fuck would anyone say that? Unless they’re completely socially inept, that kind of comment is just made to make you feel like shit. Fuck that person.
